short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows use of Motorola Solutions Dispatch plugin Manifest3

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Plugin lets you open inbound and outbound audio              connections to Kodiak PoC Server for Building conference calls, push-to-talk systems, etc all from the browser.
